features: 🏠【ECO-FRIENDLY & SAFE CANDLE MELTER】 Compared with traditional burning, Noojinn wax melt warmer utilizes top-down heat melting technology to melt candles to provides a safe and eco-friendly way to enjoy candles. Last longer, no open flame, no smoke, no soot, no pollution, and reducing fire risk. Electric candle lamp warmer can control the melting speed and use time of candles through timing and brightness adjustment, creating a comfortable atmosphere for you to sleep, yoga and read books.

💡【SLEEP LIGHT WITH 4 BRIGHTNESS & 8H TIMING FUNCTION】 The lamp candle warmer has 4 levels of height temperature adjustable (0%-25%-50%-75%-100%), the stronger the brightness, the faster the candle melts. Never waste a single drop of your candles, comfort and ultimate relaxation await. Moreover, it has 0-2800k magical color temperature levels as night lamps with 2-8H timer functions provide the perfect mood for an undisturbed sweet dream.

🕯️【FITS ALL CANDLE SIZES】 Electric candle warmer adjustable height 3.1-6.9'', designed with grooves on the 4.7*7.1'' rugged wooden base for storing candles of all sizes, widest 4.7 * highest 6.9‘’ small & large Jar candles! Under the wooden base, anti-slip pads are added to ensure stability, making you feel safer when using this candle wax warmers for jar candles. Just enjoy the fragrance of your favorite scented jar candles.(Candle not included)

💖【PERFECT HOME DECOR】 This candle wax warmer is a stylish combination of a wooden base, metal body, and metal shade, blending classic and modern designs. The candle warmers for scented wax is an exquisite functional decorative lamps, night light for home living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, study room, office, classroom, yoga studios, beauty salon, barber room and more.

🎁【BEST GIFTS IDEA】 Show your love to your family, lover, or friends with this house warming gifts new home essential. Elegant appearance and practical performance make these candle lamps birthday gifts for women, men,girls,boys. Ideal for Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, Easter, Graduation gifts, Fathers day gifts, Teacher gifts, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas. Any problems please contact us, we will respond in 24H and provide a hassle-free replacement or refund.

Why choose Noojinn candle warmer lamp? The candle heater lamp is not only a adjustable brightness & height & timer candle heater can enhance service life of the candle, but also can be used as a bedside sleep lamp and a stylish home decoration. No open flame, smoke, safer to use at home. How is the candle lamp warmer work? Candle wax melting light adopt heating from top to bottom by adjusting the brightness of lamp, the candle melts and releases the fragrance during the heating process without open flame. What should I do if the candle has no scent after melting? After multiple uses, the essential oil on the surface of the candle volatilizes, and there is no aroma volatilization after heating. Need to pour out the top layer of wax oil. If you dim the light some does it still melt the wax? Of course, that's the best decision. After melting into water, the brightness can be lowered to maintain a semi melted state, so that the candle can last longer and be more fragrant Is there anything to pay attention to during use? 1) Keep the electrical cord out of reach of under 3 years old children and pets, 2) Do not touch the lampshade directly with your hands when the lamp is on, 3) Do not fire the candle when use this candle lamp

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this heat lamp
reviews.reviewText: First off this thing is so cute and looks great! It also works great and heats my candle with out the danger of fire. I have cats so I worry about leaving a candle burning. Makes my house smell amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s very nice and works great
reviews.reviewText: Love this light it works so well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this for our spare bedroom. It works like a charm, warms the candle and makes the room smell amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves this. Better than having her burn candles. Having an extra lightbulb was a bonus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really nice light
reviews.reviewText: Lovely piece for our home with a good smelling candle it make a nice addition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and a Great Price!
reviews.reviewText: I received a candle warmer as a Christma gift, then decided I needed another for upstairs! I didn't want a fancy one, just a cheap one, but couldn't really find any cheap ones! I stumbled upon this and couldnt believe the price considering it had a timer and adjustable height! It works great, I will probably get another as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great candle warmer
reviews.reviewText: This is so awesome! The size is great and it helps your room smell awesome! Love that you can control the brightness and the number of hours on! So glad I bought it! The price is great also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lamps works and I’m loving it…
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant at first to purchase. I’m totally glad I did. I even purchased two. For me and my daughter. The lamp actually works. Picture proves candle’s melting and so smelling all over my living/dining rooms. Safe to use, adjustable height with dimmer and timer. Love it! I will purchase again to give as gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This candle warmer lamp, with its adjustable height and dimmable feature is a fantastic addition to my home decor. The modern design adds an aesthetic touch to any room. It's not just good; it's a beautiful way to enjoy scented candles without a flame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a good quality candle lamp. It's very easy to set up and use. I like that the light is dimmable and it's very easy to change the brightness. It's great that there's also a timer function. I found it melted my candles well, which I was a bit dubious at first, but was soon proved wrong. This is a safer way to 'burn' candles than using a flame; so particularly useful for children, elderly persons or those with disabilities and safer around pets! Definitely worth purchasing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Such a good idea and it works !
reviews.reviewText: Candles have been burnt for years in my flat and when I noticed a thin layer of tar on everything in the flat which is caused by the black smoke the candles generate sometimes.I was aware of the good candle hygiene , which is to trim the wick every time to prevent that and I’ve never had issues with candle tunneling so I must’ve been doing something right but I still got the layer of tar on walls and pretty sure inhaled some too.This is why I tried this simple device and I was a bit skeptical but it really works as advertised.The bulb generates enough heat to melt the wax which is what releases the lovely scents.It doesn’t take long for the wax to melt although this is dependent on how close lower the light towards the candle.Love the timer function too and I’d argue it’s actually critical for this type of stuff bot for safety reasons and for comfort as you may not want to heat up your candle for endless amounts of time….and if you do, just leave it on without the timers.In terms of ease of use - this is very simple to install and operate.Materials quality is good - not the biggest fan of the old wood print on the base but I’ll live with it.The price is not available at the time of the review but if I you were to ask me, I’d pay between £20-30 for this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Great product but would like it to be a bit brighter
reviews.reviewText: I've loved using this lamp. It melts my candles quickly but you definitely keep the smell as if you were burning a candle normally and I found that the scent has lasted longer than if I'd burnt the candle. Really great product - my only issue is that it doesn't get that bright so you definitely need a second light on to light up the room. But if you're looking for something that gives off the same light ambience as a candle then this will work for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Great instead of having lit flames
reviews.reviewText: This is aively lamp. I love that touch csn place scented candles on the tray and the lamp melts it releasing the scent. It has a timer for 2, 4 or 6 hours and then it automatically turns off, so no forgetting to turn it off. You can adjust the intensity/heat of the lamp too. Easy to adjust the height of the lamp so most candle sizes will work with this - this could be aittle more sturdy though. On the whole, great lamp, and I really love nit having to have lit candles now! Also came with 2 bulbs which I'm pleased about.
